name: SmartTimer
0:
”Alexa tell Smart Timer to set a two minute timer”
”Next round”
”Turn on the countdown”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart timer
des:
Smart Timer is a superior game, exercise, or any other use timer that keeps you informed of the remaining time on your timer without you having to ask Alexa. If you are playing a game or performing an exercise, you don't have time to ask Alexa for the remaining time, so Smart Timer allows you to focus on your game or exercise and keeps you regularly updated on its progress. You can also enable or disable a final 10-second countdown to your timer so you know exactly how much time is left at the end. It is a fantastic skill to replace all of those pesky hourglass timers from your board games. You can even repeat the previous timer just by saying "next round."
To turn on the last 10-second countdown, say, "turn on the countdown." To turn it off, say, "turn off the countdown."
Smart Timer supports Echo Show and FireTV devices with on-screen menus. 

To add this skill to a Daily routine, perform the following steps:
1.On your Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2.Click + to add a new routine.
3.Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4.Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5.Choose "Your Skills" > Select Smart Timer
6.Choose Device to perform the routine > SAVE.

In-Skill Products available: 

Exercise Timer: The Exercise timer allows you to separately specify an exercise period followed by a rest period for up to four cycles, perfect for your circuit training routine. It will prompt you for the time to exercise, the time to rest following each exercise, and the number of rounds of exercise (from 1 to 3). The Exercise Timer will then notify you when to start each exercise and when to rest. Once your rounds are complete, simply tell Smart Timer to "exercise again" to repeat the cycle to start another session. Repeat as many times as you like until you are exhausted!

Expanded Options Pack: The Smart Timer's free content allows you to create Smart Timers that notify you every 30 seconds for the final three minutes of your timer. If you purchase the Expanded Options pack, you will gain the ability to change the notifications to one of the following:
Option 2: Every minute for the final six minutes
Option 3: Every two minutes for the final twelve minutes
Option 4: Every five minutes for the last 30 minutes
Option 5: Every five minutes for the last 20 minutes and then every minute for the final two minutes
Just say, "change to option X" to change to the desired option.
